response.original_title: Holly's Story: A Journey to Freedom and Hope
response.overview: In this family drama based on a true story, Holly is a well-liked teenager who has trouble coping with feelings of sadness and regret -- along with isolation from her once-close friends -- after she gets an abortion. She's consoled by a sympathetic counselor at a pregnancy crisis center who accepts her and offers words of hope and mercy through faith during her struggle with post-abortion syndrome, a condition that affects many people.
response.title: Holly's Story: A Journey to Freedom and Hope
